menu_item.descript: fresh vegetables grilled and topped with chili butter. served with rice and salad.
three soft corn tortillas filled with chorizo and topped with bean sauce and sour cream. served with pico de gallo, guacamole, rice, and salad.
boned chicken leg marinated and grilled. garnished with grilled plum tomato and calabazita. served with rice and beans.
baked layers of tortilla, chicken and cheese covered with creamy poblano pepper sauce topped with sour cream. served with rice and beans and a side of salad.
the traditional and well-known dish from the city of puebla, the sauce is made following the old fashion way: four dry peppers and spices. served with rice, beans and a side of corn tortillas.
grilled sirloin steak topped with melted cheese green tomatillo sauce and red guajillo sauce. served with a cheese enchilada, rice and beans.
grilled sirloin steak with sautéed wild mushrooms in a creamy chipotle sauce. served with rice, beans and a side of corn tortillas.
grilled shell steak topped with grilled rajas of poblano peppers and onions. served with rice, beans and a side of corn tortillas.
seasonal seafood in a spicy tomato and red onions sauce with olives and capers. served with rice and salad. priced accordingly.
sautéed vegetables of the day with green tomatillo sauce. served with rice and black beans.
soft corn tortillas filled with chicken and topped with green tomatillo sauce, melted cheese and sour cream. served with rice and beans.
grilled steak enchiladas topped with red guajillo sauce, melted cheese and sour cream. served with rice and beans.
soft corn tortillas filled with shredded chicken in mole sauce over lettuce, and topped with sesame seeds, queso fresco, onions and radishes. served with rice and beans.
sautéed shrimps with poblano peppers, pineapple, and onions, rolled in a soft corn tortilla topped with chile ancho sauce and queso fresco. served with rice and beans.
with portabello mushrooms
